response.overview: We Others is an interior and exterior journey through the Latin American landscape and its human conflicts. Through the interweaving of memory and current events, the movie plays out on screen like a dream. Reflections on politics and life intermingle and pauses for contemplation of time invite the viewer to join the journey and weave their own thoughts through this dreamlike territory.
response.tagline: An inner and outer journey through the latin american landscape
response.title: Nós Outros
